content: what better way is there to enjoy your crochet skills other than to make yourself a beautiful sun hat then this hat is just perfect for you the pattern is written and tested in 5 different sizes infants toddlers child teen and adult sizes **materials** the pattern uses double knit dk #3 yarn the prototype was made using 2 strands of hobbii twister summer a fine #2 please note that 2 strands of the above yarn were used throughout you can substitute with any dk #3 yarn estimated yardage = 80 110 150 200 320 yards hook - 4 mm crochet hook difficulty level - easy terms - us terminology this bucket hat is a size-inclusive and easily customized hat that can be adapted to fit anyone
